channel.title: books on Addhana
channel.description: Recent content in books on Addhana

item.title: A Gentleman in Moscow - book review
item.description: “if a man does not master his circumstances then he is bound to be mastered by them.” Count Alexander Ilyich Rostov Hotel Metropol, Moscow, Russia (circa 1905). Source Wiki Commons It is hard finding someone that does not recommend ‘A Gentleman in Moscow‘, from my mother-in-law to my boyfriend and Bill Gates, Count Alexander Ilyich Rostov seems to have earned a place in everyone’s heart.

item.title: Ñuhon geltītsos amāzigon jaelagan
item.description: page of ‘I Want my Hat back’ but Jon Klessen After a week in which I experienced every flavor of thought available to mankind (anxiousness, sadness, hopelessness, happiness and anxiety again), I found the best way for coping with this fluctuating state of mind… simply re- read your favorite children’s book. The simplicity of it all gives you a great perspective of life.
